abstract: Stock markets ended the week with a surge on reports of a possible foreign investment in Merrill Lynch and an uptick in consumer spending.
snippet: Stock markets ended the week with a surge on reports of a possible foreign investment in Merrill Lynch and an uptick in consumer spending.
lead_paragraph: Stock markets surged Friday on reports of a possible foreign investment in Merrill Lynch and an uptick in consumer spending.

headline.main: News Mixed, but Stocks Still Manage Strong Rally
headline.print_headline: News Mixed, But Stocks Still Manage Strong Rally
